goal.en:
1. Educte students to know the evolution of modern chinese society.
2. Enable students to compare and analyze difference of Taiwan and China societies.
goal.ch:
1. 使學生瞭解現代中國社會的演化由來
2. 使學生能夠比較、分析台灣和中國社會的異同的能力

content.en:
“This course will cover topics and as social change and family system, populatim , social agriculture and social molility, environmental problems, and so on.
Each topic will the cliscurred two-three weeks.“
content.ch: 本課程將討論家庭制度變遷、人口、環境變遷、社會結構與社會流動、農業、商業、工業與近代化、宗教、祕密社會等課題。
